name: Orbmancer
description:
A small roguelike about orb slinging wizards exploring a multi dimensional dungeon.

Use new spells and items found inside the dungeon to find out whats at the end.

5 - Playable characters

3 - Stages to explore with their own unqiue twists

50 - Different staves and spells

10  - Achievements (can only earn 5 at the moment)

The game is still in development so you may run into bugs

Unsure if the mac demo even works (I dont own one)
